original_text: and seeing Peter warming himself, she looked at him and said, “You also were with the Nazarene, Jesus.”
korean_text: 베드로가 불 쬐고 있는 것을 보고 주목하여 이르되 너도 나사렛 예수와 함께 있었도다 하거늘

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 베드로가 불을 쬐고 있는 것을 보고

sentences.original_text: “You also were with the Nazarene, Jesus.”
